snippet.textDisplay: My 3dsmax crashes when I use the sun.. Why is that?
snippet.textOriginal: My 3dsmax crashes when I use the sun.. Why is that?

snippet.textDisplay: For crashes and other serious issues, always best to contact support (who can't monitor YouTube comments), see https://support.corona-renderer.com/hc/en-us . I would do that, and meantime you can also check resetting the activation files as described on https://support.corona-renderer.com/hc/en-us/articles/4402104162577-Activation-is-required-each-time-I-start-3ds-Max-frequent-crashes-material-editor-issues. Thanks! Tom
snippet.textOriginal: For crashes and other serious issues, always best to contact support (who can't monitor YouTube comments), see https://support.corona-renderer.com/hc/en-us .
